daoLayer

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • daoLayer.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    This class is a part of the DAO layer. The class which communicates between the company's object related methods and the Mysql data base through sql queries.
    Version:
    1.0 February 20, 2017.
    Author:
    Ehud Perlman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompanyDBDAO()
      Constructs the class that communicates with the db and initializes the pool variable with the Connection pool's instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCompany(Company company)
      This method creates the company's record into the Mysql data base, using the received company parameter.
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
      This method receives all the company's records of all the companies from the Mysql data base.
      Company getCompany(long id)
      This method receives the company's record from the Mysql data base, using the received company's id parameter.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons()
      This method receives all the logged company's coupons from the records of the Mysql data base.
      boolean login(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String password)
      A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
      void removeCompany(Company company)
      This method removes the company's record from the Mysql data base, using the received company parameter.
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      This method updates some columns in the company's record in the Mysql data base, using the received company parameter.

                   throws java.sql.SQLException,

                          ShutDownException

        Specified by:
        createCompany in interface CompanyDAO
        Parameters:
        company - - the company object that is filled with the fields of the company to add to the data base.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - When database access error or other errors occur.
        DuplicateDataException - - in cases which the company to add to the data base exists. already.
        ShutDownException - - in cases which the system is shutting down while there is attempt to do use of the program.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String compName,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws java.sql.SQLException,
                     LogInFailureException,
                     ShutDownException
        A method for login into the system through passing user name and password.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CompanyDAO
        Parameters:
        compName - - the user name of the company that wants to log in.
        password - - the password of the company that wants to log in.
        Returns:
        login - boolean weather the credentials are correct or not.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - When database access error or other errors occur.
        LogInFailureException - - if the credentials are wrong.
        ShutDownException - - in cases which the system is shutting down while there is attempt to do use of the program.
